content: hook single_crochet 10 10 sts fasten ob leave a tail for sewing face detailing short tattoo make 2 round 1 take black yarn chain 4 turn 4 sts round 2 starting at second loop from hook single_crochet 3 3 sts fasten ob leave a tail for sewing using your tapestry needle sew the long tattoos above the eyes sew the short tattoos just below the eyes then sew your completed face onto the body the center of the face should be about 14 row down from the top of the body the circle at the top of the head should line up with the curve of the top of the body banner round 1 take bright red yarn chain 17 turn 17 sts round 2 starting at second loop from hook single_crochet 16 ch1 turn 16 sts round 3-7 repeating round 2 fasten ob weave in the end round 8 take bright yellow yarn slip_stitch at end of round 7 single_crochet 16 16 sts round 9 chain 50 50 sts note - the length of your string will depend on the thickness of the yarn you re using you want this string to be able to fit around the neck of your plushie so i would eyeball it out round 10 once you reach the other side of the bright red banner single_crochet 16 16 sts fasten ob weave in the end for the banner symbol take your bright yellow yarn and tapestry needle and sew one upright triangle at the top and one upside down triangle at the bottom
